coreAtributes.authorTag: A small sticker informs you that this was made by a 'Zyro'.
coreAtributes.name: Viper Helmet
coreAtributes.description: The Viper Helmet is composed of extraterrestrial materials designed to be worn by snake women from another world.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Viper Helmet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Viper Helmet and tear it off [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Viper Helmet and roughly tears it off your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Viper Helmet and roughly tears it off from [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Viper Helmet.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Viper Helmet on [npc.name]'s [npc.head].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Viper Helmet onto [npc.her] head.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts the Viper Helmet on your head.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Viper Helmet on top of your head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts the Viper Helmet on [npc2.name]'s head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Viper Helmet onto [npc2.her] head.
